name: Form: Soul
description:
When in Soul form you can use three spells:

(USE)
"Ainir's Blessing"
Use one soul and shoot a blessing beam, which rejuvenates allies.

(PRIMARY)
"Summon Lich-borne"
Using 2 souls summon a Lich-borne for a limited time

(SECONDARY)
"Summon Lich-borne ravager"
Using 6 souls, summon a Lich-borne ravager for 30 seconds. Along with one Lich-Borne.
